query.code:
with temp as (

    select 1 as id, 1 as y, 1 as x
    union select 1 as id, 2 as y, 2 as x
    union select 1 as id, 3 as y, 3 as x
    union select 1 as id, 4 as y, 4 as x

    union select 2 as id, 11 as y, 1 as x
    union select 2 as id, 12 as y, 2 as x
    union select 2 as id, 13 as y, 3 as x
    union select 2 as id, 14 as y, 4 as x
)
select * from temp

visualization.title: 数据表格1

visualization.code:
# 返回表格
fig = px.line(
    df,
    x="x",  # X-axis values
    y="y",  # Y-axis values

    animation_frame="id",  # Animation frames based on year
)
result = fig
